Text:
Can't seem to find the English Audio.  I'm using MPC, with the K-Lite Codec Pack.

So far, it seems to have only Japanese audio and English subtitles.

I've only downloaded the last set (Part/Vol 5, episodes 53-64), which is the one that many are waiting for the English dub on.  It seems we must continue to wait.... :(

DOH!  Nevermind....just found it.


Excellent work!  Thanks for forwarding this on to TPB community!
hey where did you find the audio?

to change audio and subs in most video players you can right click the video screen and there will be audio and video sub menus and im sure you can figure out the rest

I have had issues with dual audio on WMP

will seed this forever when I finish downloading! the best anime I've ever watched. thanks schroed4!
